1.content: Research major tutoring platform features and business models
1.details: Analyze platforms like Tutor.com, Wyzant, Chegg Tutors, Preply, and others to understand feature sets, pricing models, and user experience patterns

2.details: Research pharmacy education standards, common topics, certification requirements, and specialized needs for pharmacy students

3.content: Research single-tutor platform features and monetization strategies
3.details: Investigate how individual tutors successfully operate their own platforms, what features drive engagement, and sustainable revenue models

4.content: Analyze technical requirements and platform architecture
4.details: Research essential technical features including scheduling, payment processing, content delivery, student management, and analytics

5.content: Compile comprehensive feature list with implementation recommendations
5.details: Synthesize all research into a prioritized list of features suitable for a single pharmacy tutor, including core features, advanced features, and optional enhancements
